QuestData.Title: Red Dawn
QuestData.Description:
We've come so close to recovering our powers... should Raszageth succeed before our powers return, I fear that the timeways will bend to a dark future for all of Azeroth.
We must not allow this to occur, $n!
Hurry, you must find and aid Alexstrasza before all is lost!
QuestData.RewardText: Razageth and her allies must be stopped!
